name: df-domn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cdomn, crab(s0, cnzr, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wi(wceq(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cv(s4)), cv(s2)), wo(wceq(cv(s3), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s4), cv(s2))))))))))
comment: A _domain_ is a nonzero ring in which there are no nontrivial zero divisors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Mar-2015.)
